articles.description: The Delhi Customs on Saturday (December 19, 2020) said that they have seized 1.13 kg gold worth Rs 49.9 lakh from a Dubai to Delhi bound IndiGo flight. The gold was concealed underneath the seat track guards.
articles.content: New Delhi: The Delhi Customs on Saturday (December 19, 2020) said that they have seized 1.13 kg gold worth Rs 49.9 lakh from a Dubai to Delhi bound IndiGo flight. The gold was concealed underneath th… [+685 chars]

articles.title: Tiredness in Nifty creeping in, time-wise correction could be seen in short term - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Currently, huge disparity is seen between the current price of the index and 200-DMA. Such deviation tends to narrow, so, time-wise correction could be seen in near term.

articles.title: Bharti Owned OneWeb to Provide Satellite Internet in India by Mid 2022 - TelecomTalk
articles.description: Bharti Group earlier this year saved OneWeb from going bankrupt by investing a total of $1 billion through Bharti Global along with the UK Government
articles.content: OneWeb, a satellite internet operator is all set to provide high-speed internet services in India by 2022. For the unaware, OneWeb is owned by Bharti Group and the UK government. Today it launched a … [+2349 chars]

articles.title: Ikea opens in Navi Mumbai with meatballs, biryani and 1,000-seater restaurant - India Today
articles.description: Trending News: Latest Trending in India, Buzz, Hot on Social Media, What is Trending in the World, World Trending News, Trending on Social Media
articles.content:
Ikea opened its second store in Navi Mumbai yesterday. The new store houses a
1,000-seater restaurant, 7,000 varieties of home furnishing products, Ikea's
signature meatballs and biryani.
